description: GIO Scenarios optimized with MTF(1H&4H same; 1D same/neutral), ADX filter, ATR TP/SL, Volume+Cluster weights, CVD+Volume bonus.

global_settings.mtf_rule: 1H & 4H same direction; 1D same or neutral (neutral → confidence*0.9; opposite → block)

scenarios.title: MOMENTUM / LONG

mtf_rule.rule: 1H&4H same; 1D same or neutral; neutral -> confidence*0.9; opposite -> block

news.behavior: if negative -> reduce confidence 0.8; if positive -> boost 1.05

notes: Ensure data availability for CVD/cluster. If no ticks, emulate via candle delta.
Volume regime adjustment may scale weights dynamically.
